dogsbody.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who has to do all the small boring jobs that no one else wants to do
dogsbody.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I spent the summer helping out as a general dogsbody.
dogsbody.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who is given the uninteresting or unpleasant jobs to do
dogsbody.translation[1].definitions[0].e: I got myself a job as typist and general dogsbody on a small magazine.
